external_references.description: Nathaniel Morales, Nick Dai. (2025, February 18). Earth Preta Mixes Legitimate and Malicious Components to Sidestep Detection. Retrieved September 10, 2025.

objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has leveraged legitimate software tools such as AntiVirus Agents, Security Services, and App Development tools to execute scripts and to side-load dlls.(Citation: Palo Alto Unit42 STATELY TAURUS TONESHELL September 2023)(Citation: Trend Micro Mustang Panda Earth Preta Toneshell February 2025)
